wikipedia_page.main: Ralph Neville-Grenville DL, JP (born Ralph Neville; 27 February 1817 – 20 August 1886) was a British Conservative Party politician.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1874 United Kingdom general election

response: *Ralph Neville-Grenville (1817–1886), British MP for Windsor, Somerset East and Somerset Mid

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1868 United Kingdom general election

response: The Mid Somerset by-election of 1878 was fought on 19 March 1878.  The byelection was fought due to the resignation of the incumbent Conservative MP, Ralph Neville-Grenville.  It was won by the Conservative candidate William Gore-Langton.
